title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.21 - Packing plant records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.21 - Packing plant records

State Regulations

All egg packing plants shall make and maintain a record of
the flocks of origin of the eggs packed each day. Said records shall be made
available for inspection upon the demand of the regulatory officials of the
state or other jurisdiction in which said plants are located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
57.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
